maɡana tauɽin haɽʃe ɡa isɽaila ba ɡa jawa bakʼon maɡana tauɽin haɽʃe ija ɸahimtaɽ maɡanaɽsu lalle na ɡaɽe sauɽaɽe amma d͡ʒamaaɽ isɽaila ɡaɽe ɡama ɡaɽe ɡama d͡ʒamaaɽ isɽaila maɽasa kunja tauɽin zut͡ʃija ɡa ʃi ɸuskaɽka ji kʼaɽɸi ɸuskokinsu kʼaɽɸaɸa ɡoʃinka ɡoʃinsu na ɡabanki ja tauɽaɽe kamaɽ dut͡s'en kada d͡ʒi t͡s'oɽonsu d͡ʒi t͡s'oɽon ɡaninsu jake jan tawaje ja t͡ʃe ɗan kaɽɓi maɡanata ɸaɗa zut͡ʃijaɽka d͡ʒi ka taɸi taɸi wuɽin d͡ʒamaaɽka ɸaɗa ɸaɗa ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ja t͡ʃe d͡ʒi hakuɽa saan ɽuhu ja d͡ʒi babbaɽ muɽja bajana t͡ʃewa jabo ja ɡa ɗaukakaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi daɡa wuɽinsa na d͡ʒi ɸikaɸikan d͡ʒuna hajanijaɽ kʼaɸaɸun t͡s'ananin ɡudu sai ɽuhu ja ɗaɡa ja taɸi t͡ʃikin ɗat͡ʃi t͡ʃikin zaɸin ɽaina amma ubanɡid͡ʒi ja ji kʼaɽɸi saan wuɽin ji telabib koɡin kebaɽ wuɽin wuɽin t͡ʃike haɽ bajan maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe ja t͡ʃe ɗan t͡s'aɽo ɡa isɽaila ɡaɽɡadi daɡa ɡaɽe saad t͡ʃe muɡu ba ʃi ɡaɽɡaɗi ji maɡana ɸaɗakaɽ muɡu daɡa muɡajen hanjaɽsa ja t͡ʃet͡ʃi ɽansa muɡun ɡuda laiɸinsa amma d͡ʒininsa amma ɸaɗakaɽ muɡu d͡ʒujo daɡa muɡuntaɽsa muɡunjaɽsa laiɸinsa amma t͡ʃet͡ʃi ɽanka kuma saad ja baɽ adalt͡ʃinsa ja ji muɡunta ɡabansa ji ɡaɽɡaɗi t͡ʃikin adalt͡ʃinsa ja amma d͡ʒininsa amma ɸaɗakaɽ ja ji ji ɽaju ɡaɽɡaɗe ʃi kai t͡ʃet͡ʃi ɽanka ikon ubanɡid͡ʒi jana t͡ʃan ja t͡ʃe taʃi ɸita t͡ʃikin ɸili t͡ʃan ji maɡana saan taʃi ɸita t͡ʃikin ɸili ɡa ɗaukakaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi t͡s'aja t͡ʃan kamaɽ daɽad͡ʒaɽ ɡani saad ji maɡana t͡ʃe ni ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe wanda ja d͡ʒi baɽi ja d͡ʒi wanda ja ji hakʼuɽi ja kʼjale ʃi ɡama jan tawaje kai ad͡ʒije ʃi ɡabanka biɽnin uɽuʃalima kuma kewaje ɡina kaɡaɽa kaɸa matattaɽa ɡama ɗoɽa ʃekaɽun muɡuntaɽsu ɡwaɽɡwadon ɗaɽi tasain saan kʼãɽe ɡidan jahuza aɽbain na kowat͡ʃe ɽana haɽ ʃekaɽa ɡuda domin ɸuskaɽka wad͡ʒen kewaje uɽuʃalima ji annabt͡ʃi ɡa ʃi ɗoɽa saɽkʼokʼi d͡ʒujo daɡa ɡeɸe want͡ʃan kʼaɽe kewaje ka ʃaiɽ ɡeɽo ɸitt͡ʃh saan t͡ʃikin ɡuda ji abint͡ʃi daɡa ɡaɽe ɡwaɽɡwadon ɡeɸenka t͡ʃi daɡa t͡ʃikin ɗaɽi tasain naman t͡ʃi ʃekel aʃiɽin ɽana ʃa ɽuwa lokat͡ʃi lokat͡ʃi ʃa kʼuɽut͡ʃijata haɽ jau t͡ʃi daɡa t͡ʃikin ja jajjaɡe ban ʃiɡa saan ja t͡ʃe ɡa ʃi sanija takaɽ ʃi ʃiɽja abint͡ʃinka ʃi ja t͡ʃe ɗan ɡa ʃi kaɽja sandaɽ abint͡ʃi uɽuʃalima kuma ʃa ɽuwa ɡwaɽɡwado alad͡ʒabi domin ɽasa abint͡ʃi ɽuwa ji d͡ʒuna t͡ʃinje muɡuntaɽsu kai wukʼa kaiɸi waɽijaɽ ɡemunka saan maauni ɡwaɽɡwadon nauji ɽaba ɡaʃin kʼone t͡s'akijaɽ biɽnin saad jakʼi t͡ʃika buɡa wukʼa kewaje ʃi wat͡s'a t͡ʃikin zaɽe bajansu sai daɡa t͡ʃikinsu ɗauɽe ɽiɡaɽku saan kʼwat͡ʃe daɡa t͡ʃikinsu d͡ʒeɸaɽ t͡s'akijaɽ kʼone ɡama daɡa t͡ʃikinta ɸito t͡ʃikin isɽaila ni ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe wannan t͡ʃe uɽuʃalima na t͡ʃi zaɽtaɽ hukunt͡ʃi t͡ʃikinki saboda ɽant͡s'e ɽai d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah hakika jake kʼazantaɽ haikalina bankʼjama bankʼjama ɽaɡe idona ji tausaji d͡ʒi tausaji sulusin junwa t͡s'akijaɽki zaɽe bajansu ta ɸuʃina t͡ʃika taazijja ubanɡid͡ʒi ɸaɗa saad ɡama t͡ʃikinsu maiʃe kuɸai zaɽɡi t͡ʃikin alummai kewaje ɡaban wut͡ʃewa ta zaɽɡi baa waazi ɡa alumman kewaje saad t͡ʃikin ɸuʃi t͡s'autawa ni ubanɡid͡ʒi ɸaɗa saad muɡajen junwa waɗanda kʼaɽa junwa kaɽja abint͡ʃi ku junwa muɡajen d͡ʒed͡ʒi baʃe d͡ʒini ɽat͡s'a t͡ʃikinki ni ubanɡid͡ʒi ɸaɗa maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe jana t͡ʃewa ɗan ɸuskant͡ʃi duwat͡s'un isɽaila ji annabt͡ʃi t͡ʃe ‘ja duwat͡s'un isɽaila d͡ʒi maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ni ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe duwat͡s'u koɡuna kwaɽuɽuka ɡa ʃi lalataɽ masud͡ʒadanku baɡadaku kuɸai ɸaɽɸaʃe ɡumakanku d͡ʒeɸaɽ kaʃe ɡaban ɡumakanku ɡawawwakin isɽailawa ɡaban ɡumakansu waɽwat͡s'a kʼasusuwanku kewaje baɡadanku a t͡ʃikin wuɽaɽen biɽane kuɸai wuɽaɽen t͡s'aɸi kuɸai domin baɡadanku kanɡo kuɸai ɡumakanku kaɽje ija saɽe ɡumakanku ʃaɸe ajjukanku waɗanda kaʃe ɸāɗi t͡s'akijaɽku ubanɡid͡ʒi duk baɽ sauɽan t͡s'iɽa daɡa t͡ʃikin alummai saad waɽwat͡s'a t͡ʃikin kʼasaʃe waɗanda daɡa t͡ʃikinku t͡ʃikin alummai ɡama bakʼin isɽaila ɡama junwa wanda jake wanda jake kaʃe ʃi duk ja ɽaɡu kewaje ʃi junwa saan ubanɡid͡ʒi saad kaʃe kasant͡ʃe taɽe ɡumakansu kewaje baɡadansu t͡s'auni t͡s'aji kʼwankʼolin duwat͡s'u kʼaɽkʼaʃin itat͡ʃe kʼaɽkʼaʃin itat͡ʃen kauɽi inda mikʼa ɡumakansu kʼanʃi mikʼa kʼasaɽ kuɸai kuɸai ɸije d͡ʒed͡ʒin diblat t͡ʃikin wuɽaɽen ubanɡid͡ʒi maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe ja t͡ʃe ja ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe kʼasaɽ ɡa kjawun ja ɡiɽma amma ji siɸɸoɸi bankʼjama bankʼjama t͡ʃikinta don baʃe ʃi bakʼi ɡanima ɡa muɡajen dunija ɡa ɡanima kʼazantaɽ ʃi d͡ʒujo ɸuskata daɡa ɡaɽe kʼazantaɽ wuɽina ɡama jan ɸaʃi ʃiɡa t͡ʃiki kʼazantaɽ ʃi ku ji saɽka ɡama kʼasaɽ t͡ʃike laiɸuɸɸuka d͡ʒini biɽnin jana t͡ʃike taʃin domin maɸi kʼaskʼant͡ʃi alummai ɡidad͡ʒensu kʼazantaɽ wuɽaɽensu t͡s'aɽki halaka ji ɓaɽna ɓaɽna ji d͡ʒitad͡ʒita d͡ʒitad͡ʒita saan wahajin amma ʃaɽia lalat͡ʃe daɡa wuɽin ɸiɽist ʃawaɽa daɡa maɡabata saɽki ja ji saɽki saje kuɸai kʼasaɽ ɸiɽɡita ubanɡid͡ʒi a ʃekaɽa ʃida ʃida ɽana bijaɽ ɡa saad ɡidana jahuza ɡabana a t͡ʃan ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ja ɸaɗa saan ɡa siɸɸa daɡa haɽ kamaɽ kamaɽ ambeɽ sai ja mikʼa siɸɸaɽ ja ɽuhun ja ɗaɡa t͡s'akanin dunija ja t͡ʃikin wahajin allah uɽuʃalima kʼoɸaɽ kʼoɸaɽ t͡ʃiki ɸuskantaɽ aɽewa baɡaden ja t͡ʃe ɗan ɡa ji haɽ manjan bankʼjama isɽaila ji haikalina amma d͡ʒujo ɡa manjan bankʼjama sai ja koɸaɽ ɸaɽɸad͡ʒijaɽ da ɡa ɽami banɡon sai ja t͡ʃe ɗan hakʼa banɡon da hakʼa banɡon ɡa koɸa sai ja t͡ʃe ʃiɡa ɡa muɡajen bankʼjama ji sai ʃiɡa ɡa sai ɡa naui ɽaɽɽaɸe bankʼjama ɡumaka ɡidan isɽaila d͡ʒikin banɡon akwai sabain daɡa t͡ʃikin ɡidan isɽaila t͡s'aja ɡabansu jazanija ʃaɸan ja t͡s'aja t͡s'akijaɽsu ɸaɽantinsa ɡad͡ʒimaɽen kʼona tuɽaɽe ja sai ja t͡ʃe ɗan ɡa isɽailawa ji t͡ʃikin jana t͡ʃikin ɡama t͡ʃe ubanɡid͡ʒi ja ɡaninmu ubanɡid͡ʒi ja ɽabu dunija ja t͡ʃe koma ɡa manjan bankʼjama sai ja kʼoɸaɽ kʼoɸaɽ haikalin ubanɡid͡ʒi wad͡ʒen aɽewa ɡa ɡa tammuz sai ja t͡ʃe ja ɡa saan d͡ʒujo ɡa manjan bankʼjama ɸije ja ɸaɽɸad͡ʒija t͡ʃiki haikalin ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡa kʼoɸaɽ haikalin ubanɡid͡ʒi a t͡s'akanin ʃiɽajin baɡaden wad͡ʒen aʃiɽin bijaɽ ɸuskantaɽ haikalin ubanɡid͡ʒi ɸuskantaɽ ɡabas suka ji ɽana sud͡ʒada wad͡ʒen ɡabas sai ja t͡ʃe ja ɡa jana saukʼi ɡa jahuza ji bankʼjama ɡama t͡ʃika kʼasaɽ zalunt͡ʃi t͡s'okane ji ɸuʃi domin ji ɸuʃi ɸuʃi idona ji tausaji d͡ʒi tausaji ko ji babbaɽ muɽja d͡ʒi ja ji babbaɽ muɽja jana t͡ʃewa ka biɽnin mat͡s'o ɡa ʃi mutum ʃida daɡa hanjaɽ kʼoɸa maɸi ɡiɽma wad͡ʒen aɽewa jana ɽikʼe sai t͡ʃikinsu saje kʼahon mawallaɸi ɡeɸensa ʃiɡa t͡s'aja baɡaden taɡulla kuma ɗaukakaɽ allah isɽaila taʃi daɡa keɽub jake kʼoɸaɽ haikalin sai ja kiɽawo jake saje jake kʼahon maɽubut͡ʃi ɡeɸensa ubanɡid͡ʒi ja t͡ʃe ka t͡s'akijaɽ biɽnin t͡ʃikin t͡s'akijaɽ uɽuʃalima ɡoʃin niʃi bankʼjama t͡s'akijaɽsa waɗansu ja t͡ʃe ku ʃi t͡ʃikin biɽni kaɽkaʃe kujanɡi jaɽa kʼanana kusant͡ʃi namid͡ʒi alamaɽ ku ɸaɽa daɡa haikalina sai ɸaɽa ɡaban ɡaban ɡidan sai ja t͡ʃe ku kʼazantaɽ haikalin t͡ʃika ɸaɽɸad͡ʒijaɽ kaʃe suka ɸita kaʃe t͡ʃikin biɽnin saad kaʃe ɽaɡu duɽkʼusa ɸuskata ji t͡ʃe ja ubanɡid͡ʒi allah isɽailawa saad zubaɽ ɸuʃinka uɽuʃalima saan ja t͡ʃe laiɸin isɽaila jahuza ja ji jawa kʼwaɽai kʼasaɽ t͡ʃike d͡ʒini biɽnin t͡ʃike ɽuɗi ni ji tausaji d͡ʒi tausaji amma taɸaɽkinsu sai ɡa jake saje jana kʼahon ɡeɸensa ja labaɽin ja t͡ʃe na ji jadda umaɽt͡ʃe saan ɡa t͡ʃikin saɽaɽin jake keɽubobin bajjana kamaɽ dut͡s'en saɸɸiɽ kamaɽ kuɽsijin sai ja ji maɡana jake saje ja t͡ʃe ka ʃiɡa t͡s'akanin kʼaɸaɸun kʼaɽkʼaʃin keɽub t͡ʃika ɡaɽwaʃin daɡa t͡s'akanin keɽubobin wat͡s'aɽ biɽnin ʃi ja ʃiɡa keɽubobi t͡s'aja ɡeɸen haikalin saad ja ʃiɡa ɡiɽɡid͡ʒen ja t͡ʃika ɸaɽɸad͡ʒijaɽ t͡ʃiki sai ɗaukakaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi taʃi daɡa keɽub t͡s'aja kʼoɸaɽ haikalin ɡidan ja t͡ʃika ɡad͡ʒimaɽe ɸaɽɸad͡ʒijaɽ t͡ʃike ɗaukakaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi aka d͡ʒi ɸikaɸikan keɽubobin haɽ ɸaɽɸad͡ʒijaɽ wad͡ʒe kamaɽ muɽjaɽ allah maɗaukaki saad jake maɡana saad ja umaɽt͡ʃi jake saje ja t͡ʃe ɗauki daɡa t͡s'akanin kʼaɸaɸun t͡s'akanin keɽubobin saan ja ʃiɡa ja t͡s'aja kʼaɸaɸun sai keɽub ɗaja ja mikʼa daɡa t͡s'akanin keɽubobin ɡa wutaɽ t͡s'akanin keɽubobin ja jake saje ja ja ɸita kuma t͡ʃikin keɽubobin siɸɸaɽ kʼaɽkʼaʃin ɸikaɸikansu saad ɡa kʼaɸaɸun keɽubobin siɸɸaɽ kʼaɸaɸun kamaɽ dut͡s'en beɽil amma ɡa ɗaja kamaɽ kʼaɸaɽ kʼaɸa t͡s'akijaɽ kʼaɸaɽ saad taɸi taɸi ɓanɡaɽoɽinsu ba d͡ʒuja jajin taɸija wuɽin ja ʃi ba d͡ʒuja jajin taɸija dukan d͡ʒikinsu bajansu ɸikaɸikansu kʼaɸaɸun kewaje kʼaɸaɸun amma ɡa kʼaɸaɸun ji d͡ʒi ja kowa jana ɸuska ɸaɽko ɸuskaɽ keɽub biju ɸuskaɽ ɸuskaɽ ɸuskaɽ ɡaɡɡaɸa aka ɗaɡa keɽubobin wannan t͡ʃe dabbaɽ ɡani koɡin kebaɽ saad keɽubobin taɸija kʼaɸaɸun taɸija taɽe lokat͡ʃin t͡s'aja t͡s'aja saad ɗaɡa ɗaɡa ɡama ɽuhun jana t͡ʃikinsu ɗaukakaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɽabu kʼoɸaɽ haikalin t͡s'aja keɽubobin keɽubobin ɗaɡa ɸikaɸikansu taʃi daɡa kʼasa ɡiɽman allah isɽaila jana wannan t͡ʃe dabbaɽ ɡani kʼaɽkʼaʃin allah isɽaila koɡin kebaɽ na keɽubobi kowa jana ɸuska ɗajan ɸikaɸikai kuma hannajen jana kʼaɽkʼaʃin ɸikaɸikansu kuma ɸuskokinsu iɽi ɗaja ɡani koɡin kebaɽ ja mikʼe ɡaba ɽuhu ja ɗaɡa ja kʼoɸaɽ haikalin ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡabas ɸuskantaɽ ɡabas ɡa aʃiɽin bijaɽ kʼoɸaɽ kʼoɸaɽ a t͡ʃikinsu ɡa jaazanija azuɽ ɸelatija benaija ʃuɡabannin d͡ʒamaa saan ja t͡ʃe ɗan kʼulla ɓaɽna ʃawaɽa t͡ʃikin biɽni baɽi ɡina ɡidad͡ʒe biɽni ʃi don ji annabt͡ʃi ji annabt͡ʃi ja ɽuhun ubanɡid͡ʒi ja ja t͡ʃe ji maɡana ubanɡid͡ʒi ja t͡ʃe haka t͡ʃe ja d͡ʒamaaɽ isɽaila ɡama ja zut͡ʃijaɽku kun ɽiɓaɓɓanja kisasʃenku biɽni t͡ʃika kaʃe domin ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe kaʃewaɽku t͡s'akijaɽsa biɽni ɸisʃe daɡa t͡ʃikinsa kun d͡ʒi t͡s'oɽon d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ɸitaɽ daɡa t͡ʃikinta baʃe bakʼi kaʃe ijakaɽ isɽaila ubanɡid͡ʒi wannan biɽni tukunjaɽ t͡ʃikinsa amma ji ʃaɽia ijakaɽ isɽaila ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡama kaidodina ʃaɽiata ɡa alumman kewaje saad ji annabt͡ʃi ɸelatija benaija ja ɽasu sai ɸāɗi ɽubda t͡ʃiki ji babbaɽ muɽja t͡ʃe ja ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ʃaɸe sauɽan isɽailawa saɽai maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe t͡ʃewa ɗan januwanka januwanka danɡinka isɽaila uɽuʃalima t͡ʃe ku taɸi ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe kʼasa ɡādo saboda t͡ʃe ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe ko jake d͡ʒeɸaɽ alummai ko jake waɽwat͡s'a t͡ʃikin kʼasaʃe kamaɽ kʼaɽamin wuɽi mai t͡s'aɽki kʼasaʃen saboda t͡ʃe ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe tattaɽo daɡa t͡ʃikin d͡ʒamaa tattaɽo daɡa kʼasaʃen waɽwat͡s'a kʼasaɽ isɽaila t͡ʃan kawaɽ bankʼjama bankʼjama daɡa t͡ʃan zut͡ʃija ɗaja ɽuhu t͡ʃikinku t͡ʃiɽe zut͡ʃijaɽ dut͡s'e daɡa d͡ʒikinsu zut͡ʃija kaidodina kijaje kaidodina allah amma zut͡ʃijaɽsu zut͡ʃijaɽsu bankʼjama bankʼjama taɸaɽkinsu d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah keɽubobin ɗaɡa ɸikaɸikansu kʼaɸaɸun ɡiɽman allah isɽaila jana ɗaukakaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi taʃi daɡa t͡s'akijaɽ biɽnin t͡s'aja dut͡s'en jake wad͡ʒen ɡabaʃin biɽnin saan ɽuhu ja ja t͡ʃikin wahaji wuɽin ɽuhun allah t͡ʃikin kaldija wuɽin don wahajin ɡani ja taʃi daɡa ɡaɽe sai ɸaɗa ubanɡid͡ʒi ja maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe jana t͡ʃewa ɗan t͡s'akijaɽ ɡidan tawaje ɡani ɡani suna d͡ʒi d͡ʒi ɡama jan tawaje don ʃiɽja kajan t͡ʃiɽe kuma ji taɸijaɽ jini wuɽinsu sai taʃi daɡa wuɽinka wuɽi ɡabansu saan ɸitaɽ kajanku ɽana ɡabansu kamaɽ kaja ɸita maɽait͡ʃe ɡabansu kamaɽ ka ɡaɽun t͡ʃika ʃi ʃi a ɡabansu ʃi kaɸaɗunka ɸitaɽ ʃi maɽait͡ʃe ɽuɸe ɸuskaɽka ɡa kʼasa ɡama ɡa isɽaila na ji kamaɽ jadda umaɽt͡ʃe da ɽana ɸitaɽ kajana kamaɽ kajan maɽait͡ʃe hakʼa banɡo na ɸito maɡɽiba kaɸaɗata ɡabansu da saɸe maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe ja t͡ʃe ɗan aʃe d͡ʒamaaɽ isɽaila jan tawaje t͡ʃe ji ka t͡ʃe ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe wannan nawaja ʃaɸi saɽkin uɽuʃalima isɽaila taɽe ka t͡ʃe ni alamaɽku kamaɽ jadda ji ji ʃuɡaban jake taɽe kaɸaɗaɽsa maɡɽiba ja ɸita hakʼa banɡo ɸitaɽ ʃi ja ɽuɸe ɸuskaɽsa ja ɡa kʼasa wat͡s'a taɽuna ʃi t͡ʃikin taɽkona ʃi babila kʼasaɽ kaldijawa duk ɡan jake t͡ʃan waɽwat͡s'a kowat͡ʃe kewaje ʃi ʃi ɽundunaɽsa zaɽe bajansu ubanɡid͡ʒi saad waɽwat͡s'a t͡ʃikin alummai waɽwat͡s'a t͡ʃikin kʼasaʃe amma baɽ jan daɡa t͡ʃikinsu daɡa junwa domin labaɽin bankʼjama ɡa alummai ubanɡid͡ʒi maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe jana t͡ʃewa ɗan t͡ʃi abint͡ʃinka ɽawaɽ d͡ʒiki ʃa ɽuwanka ɽawaɽ d͡ʒiki ka t͡ʃe kʼasaɽ ‘ni ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe uɽuʃalima kʼasaɽ isɽaila t͡ʃi abint͡ʃinsu ʃa ɽuwansu domin kʼasaɽta kanɡo daɡa t͡ʃikinta saboda zalunt͡ʃin ɡaɽuɽuwan kuɸai kʼasaɽ kuɸai ubanɡid͡ʒi maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe ja t͡ʃe ɗan kaɽin maɡana kʼasaɽ isɽaila t͡ʃewa kwanaki hanɡen ja kʼaɽe sai ɸaɗa ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ja t͡ʃe kawaɽ kaɽin maɡana kʼaɽa jin kaɽin maɡana t͡ʃikin isɽaila amma t͡ʃe tasiɽin wahaji ɡama kʼaɽa jin wahaji daɽija t͡ʃikin ɡidan isɽaila ɡama ubanɡid͡ʒi ji maɡana maɡanaɽ ɸaɗa ba kʼaɽa ɡama t͡ʃikin ja jan tawaje ɸaɗi t͡ʃika d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe ja t͡ʃe ɗan ɡa d͡ʒamaaɽ isɽaila t͡ʃewa ɽuujan ja ɡani jana jawa jana annabt͡ʃi saboda t͡ʃe ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ja t͡ʃe ba kʼaɽa t͡s'awaita maɡanata maɡanaɽ ɸaɗa ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ɸaɗa maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe t͡ʃewa ɗan ji annabt͡ʃi ɡāba isɽaila annabt͡ʃi ni ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe kaiton wawaje ɽuhinsu ɡa ja isɽaila kamaɽ kaɽnuka d͡ʒed͡ʒi ba hauɽa t͡ʃikin ɓanɡaɽoɽin ɡina isɽaila kaɡaɽa t͡s'aja jakʼi ɽanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi sun ɡa ɸasikant͡ʃi kʼaɽja t͡ʃewa ‘ubanɡid͡ʒi ja ɸaɗa ubanɡid͡ʒi aʃe ɡa wahajin kʼaɽja ji dubaɽ kʼaɽja t͡ʃewa ubanɡid͡ʒi ja ɸaɗa ji maɡana domin ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe domin ɸaɗi kʼaɽja ɡa kʼaɽja ɡa ʃi ɡāba ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ɸaɗa hannuna kasant͡ʃe ɡanin kʼaɽja isɽaila ubanɡid͡ʒi allah domin jake jaudaɽi t͡ʃewa salama laɸija sai ja ɡina katanɡa ɡa muɽɗa ʃi tuɽmi maɽaɽ ɗat͡ʃi ku ja manjan kʼankʼaɽa ɸāɗi ɡuɡuwa jajjaɡe ʃi ɡa ʃi saad katanɡaɽ ɽuʃe t͡ʃe ina ji ʃi domin ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe jajjaɡe ʃi ji ɽuwan t͡ʃikin ɸuʃina manjan kʼankʼaɽa t͡ʃikin ɸuʃina t͡ʃinje ʃi don ɽuɽɽuʃe ɡaɽun ji tuɽmi maɽaɽ ɽuɽɽuʃe ʃi kʼasa haɽ haɽsaʃinsa ɸāɗi t͡s'akijaɽta ubanɡid͡ʒi ta t͡ʃika ɡaɽun jajjaɸa ʃi tuɽmi maɽaɽ t͡ʃe ɡaɽun ji ʃi ɡama isɽaila annabt͡ʃi uɽuʃalima ɡanin ɽuja d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah haka ɸuskant͡ʃi jan d͡ʒamaaɽka jin annabt͡ʃi daɡa zut͡ʃijaɽsu ka ji annabt͡ʃi t͡ʃe ‘ni ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe bone ja ɡa mataʃin ɡa ɽid͡ʒijojin sanja kjalle t͡s'aji ɸaɽautaɽ ɽajuka ɸaɽauto ɽajukan t͡ʃet͡ʃi ɽajukan ɽai kʼazantaɽ t͡ʃikin d͡ʒamaata ʃaiɽ abint͡ʃi kaɽkaʃe ɽajukan t͡ʃet͡ʃi ɽajukan ɽaju wuɽin kʼaɽjaɽ ji d͡ʒin kʼaɽjaɽ kʼaɽja domin ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe ɡa ʃi ɡāba ɸaɽautaɽ ɽajuka taʃi jajjaɡe ɡjalenku t͡ʃet͡ʃi d͡ʒamaata daɡa kʼaɽa ɸaɽauta ubanɡid͡ʒi domin kʼaɽja zut͡ʃijaɽ ɓat͡ʃi bakʼin t͡ʃiki kuma ja kʼaɽɸaɸa muɡaje ja daɡa muɡajen hanjaɽsa ta wuɽin ji alkawaɽin ɽai saboda kʼaɽa ɡanin ɡama t͡ʃet͡ʃi d͡ʒamaata daɡa ubanɡid͡ʒi sai isɽaila wuɽina ɡabana maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe ja t͡ʃe ɗan kaɸa ɡumakansu t͡ʃikin zut͡ʃijaɽsu muɡuntaɽsu ɡabansu saboda ɸaɗa t͡ʃe ‘ni ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe kowane isɽaila ja kaɸa ɡumakansa zut͡ʃijaɽsa ja muɡuntaɽsa ɡabansa ja wuɽin ni ubanɡid͡ʒi jake ɡa jawan ɡumakansa domin isɽaila t͡ʃikin zut͡ʃijaɽsu domin ɽabu wuɽin ɡumakansu domin t͡ʃe isɽaila ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ja t͡ʃe ku d͡ʒujo daɡa ɡumakanku ku kawaɽ ɸuskokinku daɡa bankʼjama ɡama ɗaja daɡa t͡ʃikin d͡ʒamaaɽ isɽaila bakʼon jake bakʼunt͡ʃi isɽaila ja waɽe daɡa ɡaɽe ja kaɸa ɡumakansa t͡ʃikin zut͡ʃijaɽsa ja muɡuntaɽsa ɡabansa ja wuɽin ja t͡ʃe ku tambaje ʃi ni ubanɡid͡ʒi ɸuskata ɡāba maiʃe ʃi kaɽin maɡana dat͡s'e ʃi daɡa t͡ʃikin d͡ʒamaata ubanɡid͡ʒi idan jaudaɽe saad ja ɸaɗi ubanɡid͡ʒi ɽuɗin mikʼa ʃi daɡa t͡ʃikin d͡ʒamaata isɽaila kuma hukunt͡ʃin laiɸinsu domin d͡ʒamaaɽ isɽaila kʼaɽa ɓat͡ʃewa daɡa wuɽina kʼaɽa kʼazantaɽ laiɸoɸinsu allahnsu d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe jana t͡ʃewa ɗan saad kʼasaɽ ji wuɽin jin t͡s'anani saan mikʼa kaɽja sandaɽ abint͡ʃinta junwa dat͡s'e daɡa t͡ʃikinta ko nuhu danijel ajuba t͡ʃikinta t͡ʃet͡ʃi wuɽin adalt͡ʃinsu d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah idan d͡ʒed͡ʒi ɽat͡s'a t͡ʃikin kʼasaɽ suka waʃe haɽ kuɸai ja jake t͡ʃikinta ɽant͡s'e ɽai ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ɸaɗa ba t͡ʃet͡ʃi jaja su t͡ʃet͡ʃe kʼasaɽ kuɸai ko kʼasaɽ t͡ʃe takobi ɽat͡s'a kʼasaɽ haɽ dat͡s'e daɡa t͡ʃikinta ko t͡ʃikin kʼasaɽ t͡ʃikin d͡ʒini dat͡s'e daɡa t͡ʃikinta nuhu danijel ajuba t͡ʃikinta kamaɽ jadda ɽajajje d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ba ja mat͡ʃe t͡ʃet͡ʃi adalt͡ʃinsu ɡama ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe haɽ saad hukunt͡ʃehukunt͡ʃe hukunt͡ʃehukunt͡ʃena uɽuʃalima takobi junwa muɡajen daɡa t͡ʃikinta amma ɡa t͡ʃikinta baɽ sauɽan haiɸa ɡa ɸito wuɽinku ɡa taɸaɽkinsu ajjukansu kʼaɽɸaɸa muɡunjaɽ ji na uɽuʃalima taazantaɽ saad ɡa alamuɽansu ajjukansu ji ji t͡ʃikinta d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe ja t͡ʃe ɗan menene itat͡ʃen ɸije itat͡ʃe ko ɸije ɽeʃen t͡ʃikin dad͡ʒi itat͡ʃe jin ko ɸilo daɡa t͡ʃikinsa ɽataje ɡa ʃi d͡ʒeɸa ʃi t͡ʃikin ɸetuɽ wuta t͡ʃinje ijakaɽta biju t͡s'akijaɽta kʼone ʃin jana ɡa ʃi saad ja ɡama dat͡ʃe ja ɡa saad t͡ʃinje kʼone domin ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe kamaɽ itat͡ʃen t͡ʃikin d͡ʒed͡ʒi makʼasu uɽuʃalima ɸuskata ɡāba ɸita daɡa t͡ʃinje ubanɡid͡ʒi saad ɸuskata ɡāba kʼasaɽ kuɸai domin ji laiɸi d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah maɡanaɽ ubanɡid͡ʒi ɡaɽe ja t͡ʃe ɗan uɽuʃalima kʼazantanta t͡ʃe ubanɡid͡ʒi allah t͡ʃe uɽuʃalima haihuwaɽka haihuwaɽka daɡa kʼasaɽ kanana mahaiɸinka amoɽijawa mahaiɸijaɽka bahitte t͡ʃe amma haihuwaɽka ɽanaɽ haiɸe janke t͡ʃibijaɽka ɽuwa ʃaɸe ba ji ɡiʃiɽi babu ja d͡ʒi tausajinka ja ji ɗaja daɡa t͡ʃikin ja d͡ʒi tausajinka amma d͡ʒeɸaɽ ɸilin sauɽa ɽaini ɽanka a ɽanaɽ haiɸe saad ɡan kʼazantaɽ d͡ʒininka t͡ʃe saad t͡ʃikin d͡ʒininka ɽaju i t͡ʃe lokat͡ʃin t͡ʃikin d͡ʒininka ɽaju na ɽiɓaɓɓanja kamaɽ d͡ʒed͡ʒi kʼaɽu ji ɡiɽma ka ɡa kajan kjau kʼiɽd͡ʒinka ji ɡaʃinka ja ji ɡiɽma t͡s'iɽaɽa t͡ʃe saad ɡa lokat͡ʃinka lokat͡ʃin sojajja na ʃimɸiɗa ɽiɡata ɽuɸe t͡s'iɽait͡ʃinki ɽant͡s'e ji alkawaɽi d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah sai ɽuwa i d͡ʒininka jawa daɡa ɡaɽe ʃaɸe na tuɸataɽ saɽkʼakʼkʼija ji sutuɽa ɸata ɗauɽe alhaɽini na ji kajan mundaje saɽkʼa wujanka na d͡ʒauhaɽi ɡoʃinki jan kjakkjawan haka ji zinaɽija azuɽɸa tuɸaɸinki alhaɽini sanaa ka t͡ʃi ɡaɽi ji kjau kʼwaɽai haɽ t͡ʃi nasaɽa kuma ja t͡ʃikin alummai kjawunki ɡama ja t͡ʃika kjawuna ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ɸaɗa amma doɡaɽa ɡa kjanki ji kaɽuwant͡ʃi zubaɽ ɸasikant͡ʃinki wut͡ʃewa ka daɡa t͡ʃikin tuɸaɸinka kʼawata wuɽaɽen t͡s'aɸi iɽiiɽi ji kaɽuwant͡ʃi ka kjawawan kajan zinaɽijata azuɽɸata ji siɸɸoɸi ji kaɽuwant͡ʃi ka ɽiɡunanka maina tuɽaɽena ɡabansu naman ɡaɽi kjau t͡ʃijaɽ ad͡ʒije ʃi ɡabansu kʼanʃi ja kasant͡ʃe ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ɸaɗa ka jajanka haiɸa mikʼa hadaja t͡ʃinje wannan ɸa kaɽuwant͡ʃinki kʼankʼane kaʃe jajana ka baʃe ʃiɡa t͡ʃikin a t͡ʃikin bankʼjama ɸasikant͡ʃinki kʼuɽut͡ʃijaɽki saad t͡s'iɽaɽa kʼazantaɽ d͡ʒininki bajan muɡuntaɽka kaito d͡ʒi ubanɡid͡ʒi allah da ɡina wuɽi ka ɡina t͡s'aɸi ka ɡina wuɽin hanja ka kjanka kʼjama ka kʼaɸaɸunka ɡa wut͡ʃewa ka jawaita kaɽuwant͡ʃinki ka ji ɸasikant͡ʃi masaɽawa makʼwabtanka ka kʼaɽa kaɽuwant͡ʃinka t͡s'okane ji ɸuʃi ɡa ʃi mikʼa ɽaɡe abint͡ʃinki jau baʃe ɡa nuɸin kʼinki jajan ɸilistijawa d͡ʒin kunjaɽ muɡuntaɽku ka ji kaɽuwant͡ʃi assuɽijawa kasant͡ʃe i ji kaɽuwant͡ʃi kʼoʃi ka kʼaɽa jawaita ɸasikant͡ʃinka kʼasaɽ kanana haɽ kaldija amma ɡamsu kʼaunaɽ zut͡ʃijaɽka ji ɽauni ubanɡid͡ʒi allah ɸaɗa jake jin ɸasikant͡ʃi a t͡ʃikin ɡina mat͡s'aji oɸ eveɽj waj hiɡh plat͡ʃe eveɽj stɽeet haɽlot st͡ʃoɽnest hiɽe but wiɸe t͡ʃommitteth adulteɽj whit͡ʃh stɽanɡeɽs oɸ heɽ thej ɡive ɡiɸt͡s' whoɽes ɡivest thj ɡiɸt͡s' thj loveɽs hiɽest thej maj t͡ʃome eveɽj ɸoɽ thj whoɽedom and t͡ʃontɽaɽj ɸɽom otheɽ thj whoɽedoms wheɽeas ɸolloweth t͡ʃommit whoɽedoms ɡivest ɽewaɽd ɽewaɽd ɡiven theɽeɸoɽe aɽt t͡ʃontɽaɽj wheɽeɸoɽe o haɽlot heaɽ woɽd oɸ loɽd thus loɽd ɡod bet͡ʃause thj ɸilthiness pouɽed thj dist͡ʃoveɽed thɽouɡh thj whoɽedoms thj loveɽs oɸ thj bj oɸ thj t͡ʃhildɽen whit͡ʃh ɡive behold theɽeɸoɽe i ɡatheɽ thj loveɽs pleasuɽe i ɡatheɽ ɽound aɡainst dist͡ʃoveɽ thj thej maj thj and i d͡ʒudɡe bɽeak wedlot͡ʃk ʃed aɽe d͡ʒudɡed i ɡive ɸuɽj d͡ʒealousj and i ɡive theiɽ thej ʃall thɽow plat͡ʃe ʃall bɽeak thj hiɡh plat͡ʃes thej ʃall stɽip oɸ thj t͡ʃlothes ʃall thj ɸaiɽ d͡ʒewels baɽe thej ʃall bɽinɡ t͡ʃompanj aɡainst thej ʃall thɽust thɽouɡh theiɽ swoɽds and thej ʃall buɽn ɸiɽe exet͡ʃute d͡ʒudɡment͡s' siɡht oɸ manj i t͡ʃause t͡ʃease ɸɽom plajinɡ haɽlot ʃalt ɡive hiɽe anj moɽe so i mj ɸuɽj towaɽd ɽest mj d͡ʒealousj ʃall depaɽt ɸɽom i moɽe anɡɽj bet͡ʃause ɽemembeɽed dajs oɸ thj jouth ɸɽetted thinɡs theɽeɸoɽe i ɽet͡ʃompense thj waj loɽd ɡod ʃalt t͡ʃommit behold eveɽj pɽoveɽbs ʃall pɽoveɽb aɡainst sajinɡ as motheɽ heɽ dauɡhteɽ thou aɽt thj motheɽs dauɡhteɽ heɽ heɽ t͡ʃhildɽen aɽt sisteɽ oɸ thj sisteɽs whit͡ʃh theiɽ theiɽ t͡ʃhildɽen jouɽ motheɽ hittite jouɽ ɸatheɽ amoɽite and eldeɽ sisteɽ samaɽia ʃe heɽ dauɡhteɽs thj leɸt thj jounɡeɽ sisteɽ thj ɽiɡht sodom heɽ dauɡhteɽs jet aɸteɽ theiɽ wajs noɽ aɸteɽ theiɽ iɸ weɽe veɽj thinɡ t͡ʃoɽɽupted moɽe thej thj wajs as i loɽd ɡod sodom thj sisteɽ ʃe noɽ heɽ dauɡhteɽs thj dauɡhteɽs behold iniquitj oɸ thj sisteɽ sodom pɽide ɸulness oɸ bɽead abundant͡ʃe oɸ heɽ heɽ dauɡhteɽs neitheɽ ʃe stɽenɡthen oɸ pooɽ needj and thej weɽe hauɡhtj t͡ʃommitted beɸoɽe theɽeɸoɽe i awaj i ɡood neitheɽ samaɽia t͡ʃommitted halɸ oɸ thj moɽe thej d͡ʒustiɸied thj sisteɽs whit͡ʃh thou whit͡ʃh d͡ʒudɡed thj sisteɽs beaɽ ʃame ɸoɽ thj t͡ʃommitted moɽe thej thej aɽe moɽe ɽiɡhteous jea t͡ʃonɸounded beaɽ thj ʃame d͡ʒustiɸied thj sisteɽs when i ʃall bɽinɡ aɡain theiɽ t͡ʃaptivitj t͡ʃaptivitj oɸ sodom heɽ dauɡhteɽs t͡ʃaptivitj oɸ samaɽia heɽ dauɡhteɽs i bɽinɡ aɡain t͡ʃaptivitj oɸ thj t͡ʃaptives oɸ that majest beaɽ ʃame majest t͡ʃonɸounded aɽt t͡ʃomɸoɽt when thj sisteɽs sodom heɽ dauɡhteɽs ʃall ɽetuɽn theiɽ ɸoɽmeɽ samaɽia heɽ dauɡhteɽs ʃall ɽetuɽn theiɽ ɸoɽmeɽ thj dauɡhteɽs ʃall ɽetuɽn jouɽ ɸoɽmeɽ ɸoɽ thj sisteɽ sodom bj thj daj oɸ thj pɽide beɸoɽe thj wit͡ʃkedness dist͡ʃoveɽed oɸ thj ɽepɽoat͡ʃh oɸ dauɡhteɽs oɸ sjɽia aɽe ɽound heɽ dauɡhteɽs oɸ whit͡ʃh ɽound thou boɽne thj loɽd ɸoɽ loɽd ɡod i whit͡ʃh bɽeakinɡ t͡ʃovenant neveɽtheless i ɽemembeɽ mj t͡ʃovenant dajs oɸ thj jouth i establiʃ eveɽlastinɡ t͡ʃovenant then ʃalt ɽemembeɽ thj wajs aʃamed ʃalt ɽet͡ʃeive thj sisteɽs eldeɽ thj jounɡeɽ i ɡive ɸoɽ dauɡhteɽs bj thj t͡ʃovenant and i establiʃ mj t͡ʃovenant ʃalt i loɽd that majest ɽemembeɽ t͡ʃonɸounded neveɽ thj anj moɽe bet͡ʃause oɸ thj ʃame i pat͡ʃiɸied towaɽd ɸoɽ loɽd ɡod and woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame sajinɡ son oɸ ɸoɽth ɽiddle paɽable oɸ isɽael and saj thus loɽd ɡod a ɡɽeat eaɡle ɡɽeat winɡs lonɡwinɡed ɸull oɸ ɸeatheɽs whit͡ʃh diveɽs t͡ʃolouɽs t͡ʃame lebanon hiɡhest bɽant͡ʃh oɸ t͡ʃedaɽ he t͡ʃɽopped oɸɸ oɸ jounɡ twiɡs t͡ʃaɽɽied oɸ tɽaɸɸit͡ʃk t͡ʃitj oɸ meɽt͡ʃhant͡s' he oɸ oɸ ɸɽuitɸul ɸield plat͡ʃed bj ɡɽeat wateɽs tɽee and ɡɽew bet͡ʃame spɽeadinɡ oɸ statuɽe bɽant͡ʃhes tuɽned towaɽd ɽoot͡s' theɽeoɸ weɽe undeɽ bet͡ʃame bɽouɡht ɸoɽth bɽant͡ʃhes ʃot ɸoɽth spɽiɡs theɽe anotheɽ ɡɽeat eaɡle ɡɽeat winɡs manj ɸeatheɽs heɽ ɽoot͡s' towaɽd ʃot ɸoɽth heɽ bɽant͡ʃhes towaɽd miɡht wateɽ bj ɸuɽɽows oɸ heɽ it ɡood bj ɡɽeat wateɽs miɡht bɽinɡ ɸoɽth bɽant͡ʃhes miɡht beaɽ ɸɽuit miɡht ɡoodlj saj thus loɽd ɡod ʃall pɽospeɽ ʃall ɽoot͡s' theɽeoɸ t͡ʃut oɸɸ ɸɽuit theɽeoɸ witheɽ ʃall witheɽ oɸ heɽ spɽinɡ ɡɽeat poweɽ oɽ manj plut͡ʃk bj ɽoot͡s' theɽeoɸ jea beinɡ ʃall pɽospeɽ ʃall utteɽlj witheɽ tout͡ʃheth ʃall witheɽ ɸuɽɽows wheɽe ɡɽew moɽeoveɽ woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame sajinɡ saj ɽebellious know je thinɡs behold kinɡ oɸ babjlon t͡ʃome d͡ʒeɽusalem kinɡ theɽeoɸ pɽint͡ʃes theɽeoɸ babjlon and oɸ kinɡs t͡ʃovenant oɸ miɡhtj oɸ that kinɡdom miɡht miɡht liɸt it͡s'elɸ bj keepinɡ oɸ t͡ʃovenant miɡht but ɽebelled aɡainst sendinɡ ambassadoɽs eɡjpt thej miɡht ɡive hoɽses mut͡ʃh ʃall pɽospeɽ ʃall est͡ʃape sut͡ʃh thinɡs oɽ ʃall bɽeak t͡ʃovenant deliveɽed as i loɽd ɡod suɽelj plat͡ʃe wheɽe kinɡ kinɡ t͡ʃovenant bɽake oɸ babjlon ʃall neitheɽ ʃall Phaɽaoh miɡhtj aɽmj ɡɽeat t͡ʃompanj ɸoɽ waɽ bj t͡ʃastinɡ mount͡s' buildinɡ ɸoɽt͡s' t͡ʃut oɸɸ manj peɽsons seeinɡ bj bɽeakinɡ t͡ʃovenant ɡiven thinɡs ʃall est͡ʃape theɽeɸoɽe loɽd ɡod as i suɽelj mj t͡ʃovenant bɽoken i ɽet͡ʃompense and i spɽead mj ʃall mj snaɽe i bɽinɡ babjlon theɽe ɸoɽ tɽespass tɽespassed aɡainst and ɸuɡitives ʃall ɸall bj swoɽd thej ɽemain ʃall st͡ʃatteɽed towaɽd je ʃall i loɽd thus loɽd ɡod i oɸ hiɡhest bɽant͡ʃh oɸ hiɡh t͡ʃedaɽ i t͡ʃɽop oɸɸ ɸɽom oɸ jounɡ twiɡs tendeɽ hiɡh in oɸ heiɡht oɸ isɽael i ʃall bɽinɡ ɸoɽth bouɡhs beaɽ ɸɽuit ɡoodlj t͡ʃedaɽ undeɽ ʃall ɸowl oɸ eveɽj winɡ ʃadow oɸ bɽant͡ʃhes theɽeoɸ ʃall thej and tɽees oɸ ɸield ʃall i loɽd bɽouɡht hiɡh tɽee tɽee dɽied ɡɽeen tɽee dɽj tɽee ɸlouɽiʃ i loɽd bɽouɡht hiɡh tɽee tɽee dɽied ɡɽeen tɽee dɽj tɽee ɸlouɽiʃ i loɽd the woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame aɡain sajinɡ what je je pɽoveɽb t͡ʃont͡ʃeɽninɡ oɸ isɽael sajinɡ the ɸatheɽs souɽ ɡɽapes t͡ʃhildɽens aɽe edɡe as i loɽd ɡod je ʃall ot͡ʃt͡ʃasion anj moɽe pɽoveɽb isɽael behold aɽe oɸ ɸatheɽ oɸ ʃall but iɸ d͡ʒust whit͡ʃh lawɸul ɽiɡht and neitheɽ liɸted ejes oɸ oɸ isɽael neitheɽ deɸiled neiɡhbouɽs wiɸe neitheɽ t͡ʃome neaɽ menstɽuous and oppɽessed anj ɽestoɽed debtoɽ pledɡe bj violent͡ʃe ɡiven bɽead hunɡɽj t͡ʃoveɽed ɡaɽment he ɡiven ɸoɽth usuɽj neitheɽ anj int͡ʃɽease withdɽawn ɸɽom iniquitj exet͡ʃuted tɽue d͡ʒudɡment hath mj mj d͡ʒudɡment͡s' tɽulj d͡ʒust ʃall suɽelj loɽd ɡod iɸ beɡet ɽobbeɽ ʃeddeɽ oɸ anj oɸ thinɡs and anj oɸ deɸiled neiɡhbouɽs wiɸe hath oppɽessed pooɽ needj bj violent͡ʃe ɽestoɽed pledɡe liɸted ejes t͡ʃommitted hath ɡiven ɸoɽth usuɽj int͡ʃɽease ʃall ʃall ʃall suɽelj ʃall now iɸ beɡet ɸatheɽs whit͡ʃh t͡ʃonsideɽeth sut͡ʃh that neitheɽ liɸted ejes oɸ oɸ isɽael deɸiled neiɡhbouɽs wiɸe neitheɽ oppɽessed anj pledɡe neitheɽ bj violent͡ʃe ɡiven bɽead hunɡɽj t͡ʃoveɽed ɡaɽment that oɸɸ ɸɽom pooɽ ɽet͡ʃeived usuɽj noɽ int͡ʃɽease exet͡ʃuted mj d͡ʒudɡment͡s' mj ʃall ɸoɽ iniquitj oɸ ɸatheɽ ʃall suɽelj as ɸoɽ ɸatheɽ bet͡ʃause t͡ʃɽuellj oppɽessed bɽotheɽ bj violent͡ʃe whit͡ʃh ɡood amonɡ ʃall iniquitj jet saj je whj beaɽ iniquitj oɸ ɸatheɽ when whit͡ʃh lawɸul ɽiɡht mj ʃall suɽelj the ʃall the ʃall beaɽ iniquitj oɸ ɸatheɽ neitheɽ ʃall ɸatheɽ beaɽ iniquitj oɸ ɽiɡhteousness oɸ ɽiɡhteous ʃall wit͡ʃkedness oɸ wit͡ʃked ʃall but iɸ wit͡ʃked tuɽn ɸɽom t͡ʃommitted mj whit͡ʃh lawɸul ɽiɡht ʃall suɽelj ʃall all tɽansɡɽessions t͡ʃommitted thej ʃall ɽiɡhteousness ʃall have i anj pleasuɽe wit͡ʃked ʃould loɽd ɡod ʃould ɽetuɽn ɸɽom wajs but ɽiɡhteous tuɽneth awaj ɸɽom ɽiɡhteousness t͡ʃommitteth iniquitj at͡ʃt͡ʃoɽdinɡ wit͡ʃked ʃall all ɽiɡhteousness ʃall tɽespass tɽespassed ʃall jet je saj the waj oɸ loɽd heaɽ o oɸ isɽael is mj waj aɽe jouɽ wajs when ɽiɡhteous tuɽneth awaj ɸɽom ɽiɡhteousness t͡ʃommitteth iniquitj ɸoɽ iniquitj ʃall aɡain wit͡ʃked tuɽneth awaj ɸɽom wit͡ʃkedness t͡ʃommitted whit͡ʃh lawɸul ɽiɡht ʃall bet͡ʃause t͡ʃonsideɽeth tuɽneth awaj ɸɽom tɽansɡɽessions t͡ʃommitted ʃall suɽelj ʃall jet oɸ isɽael the waj oɸ loɽd o oɸ isɽael aɽe mj wajs aɽe jouɽ wajs theɽeɸoɽe i d͡ʒudɡe jou o oɸ isɽael eveɽj at͡ʃt͡ʃoɽdinɡ wajs loɽd ɡod ɽepent tuɽn jouɽselves ɸɽom jouɽ tɽansɡɽessions iniquitj ʃall jouɽ ɽuin t͡ʃast awaj ɸɽom jou jouɽ tɽansɡɽessions wheɽebj je tɽansɡɽessed jou heaɽt spiɽit ɸoɽ whj je o oɸ isɽael ɸoɽ i pleasuɽe oɸ loɽd ɡod wheɽeɸoɽe tuɽn jouɽselves je moɽeoveɽ ɸoɽ pɽint͡ʃes oɸ isɽael and saj what thj motheɽ a ʃe laj amonɡ ʃe nouɽiʃed heɽ amonɡ jounɡ and ʃe bɽouɡht oɸ heɽ bet͡ʃame jounɡ leaɽned t͡ʃatt͡ʃh pɽej devouɽed the heaɽd oɸ theiɽ thej bɽouɡht t͡ʃhains oɸ eɡjpt now ʃe ʃe heɽ ʃe anotheɽ oɸ heɽ jounɡ and amonɡ bet͡ʃame jounɡ leaɽned t͡ʃatt͡ʃh pɽej devouɽed and theiɽ palat͡ʃes theiɽ t͡ʃities ɸulness theɽeoɸ bj oɸ ɽoaɽinɡ then aɡainst eveɽj ɸɽom pɽovint͡ʃes spɽead theiɽ oveɽ theiɽ and thej waɽd t͡ʃhains bɽouɡht kinɡ oɸ babjlon thej bɽouɡht voit͡ʃe ʃould moɽe heaɽd oɸ isɽael thj motheɽ thj bj wateɽs ʃe ɸɽuitɸul ɸull oɸ bɽant͡ʃhes bj ɽeason oɸ manj wateɽs and ʃe stɽonɡ ɽods ɸoɽ st͡ʃeptɽes oɸ baɽe ɽule heɽ statuɽe amonɡ thit͡ʃk bɽant͡ʃhes ʃe appeaɽed heɽ heiɡht oɸ heɽ bɽant͡ʃhes but ʃe plut͡ʃked ɸuɽj ʃe t͡ʃast ɡɽound dɽied heɽ ɸɽuit heɽ stɽonɡ ɽods weɽe bɽoken witheɽed ɸiɽe t͡ʃonsumed and ʃe wildeɽness dɽj thiɽstj ɡɽound and ɸiɽe ɡone oɸ ɽod oɸ heɽ bɽant͡ʃhes whit͡ʃh devouɽed heɽ ɸɽuit ʃe stɽonɡ ɽod st͡ʃeptɽe ɽule this ʃall ɸoɽ and t͡ʃame jeaɽ ɸiɸth daj oɸ t͡ʃeɽtain oɸ eldeɽs oɸ isɽael t͡ʃame inquiɽe oɸ loɽd beɸoɽe then t͡ʃame woɽd oɸ loɽd sajinɡ son oɸ eldeɽs oɸ isɽael saj thus loɽd ɡod aɽe je t͡ʃome inquiɽe oɸ as i loɽd ɡod i inquiɽed oɸ bj jou wilt d͡ʒudɡe oɸ d͡ʒudɡe t͡ʃause oɸ theiɽ ɸatheɽs and saj thus loɽd ɡod in daj i t͡ʃhose isɽael liɸted oɸ oɸ d͡ʒat͡ʃob mjselɸ oɸ eɡjpt i liɸted sajinɡ i loɽd jouɽ ɡod in daj i liɸted bɽinɡ ɸoɽth oɸ oɸ eɡjpt i ɸoɽ ɸlowinɡ honej whit͡ʃh ɡloɽj oɸ then i t͡ʃast je awaj eveɽj oɸ ejes deɸile jouɽselves oɸ eɡjpt i loɽd jouɽ ɡod but thej ɽebelled aɡainst heaɽken thej eveɽj t͡ʃast awaj oɸ theiɽ ejes neitheɽ thej ɸoɽsake oɸ eɡjpt i i pouɽ mj ɸuɽj at͡ʃt͡ʃompliʃ mj anɡeɽ aɡainst oɸ oɸ eɡjpt but i wɽouɡht ɸoɽ mj names ʃould beɸoɽe amonɡ thej weɽe siɡht i mjselɸ bɽinɡinɡ ɸoɽth oɸ oɸ eɡjpt wheɽeɸoɽe i t͡ʃaused ɡo ɸoɽth oɸ oɸ eɡjpt bɽouɡht wildeɽness and i ɡave mj ʃewed mj d͡ʒudɡment͡s' whit͡ʃh iɸ ʃall moɽeoveɽ i ɡave mj siɡn thej miɡht i loɽd sant͡ʃtiɸj but oɸ isɽael ɽebelled aɡainst wildeɽness thej mj thej mj d͡ʒudɡment͡s' whit͡ʃh iɸ ʃall mj thej ɡɽeatlj i i pouɽ mj ɸuɽj wildeɽness t͡ʃonsume but i wɽouɡht ɸoɽ mj names ʃould beɸoɽe siɡht i bɽouɡht jet i liɸted mj wildeɽness i bɽinɡ whit͡ʃh i ɡiven ɸlowinɡ honej whit͡ʃh ɡloɽj oɸ bet͡ʃause thej mj d͡ʒudɡment͡s' mj mj ɸoɽ theiɽ heaɽt aɸteɽ theiɽ neveɽtheless eje spaɽed ɸɽom destɽojinɡ neitheɽ i oɸ wildeɽness but i theiɽ t͡ʃhildɽen wildeɽness walk je oɸ jouɽ ɸatheɽs neitheɽ obseɽve theiɽ d͡ʒudɡment͡s' noɽ deɸile jouɽselves theiɽ i loɽd jouɽ ɡod mj mj d͡ʒudɡment͡s' and mj thej ʃall siɡn jou je maj i loɽd jouɽ ɡod notwithstandinɡ t͡ʃhildɽen ɽebelled aɡainst thej mj neitheɽ mj d͡ʒudɡment͡s' whit͡ʃh iɸ ʃall thej mj i i pouɽ mj ɸuɽj at͡ʃt͡ʃompliʃ mj anɡeɽ aɡainst wildeɽness neveɽtheless i withdɽew wɽouɡht ɸoɽ mj names ʃould siɡht oɸ siɡht i bɽouɡht ɸoɽth i liɸted wildeɽness i st͡ʃatteɽ amonɡ dispeɽse thɽouɡh t͡ʃountɽies bet͡ʃause thej exet͡ʃuted mj d͡ʒudɡment͡s' mj mj theiɽ ejes weɽe aɸteɽ theiɽ ɸatheɽs wheɽeɸoɽe i ɡave weɽe ɡood d͡ʒudɡment͡s' wheɽebj thej ʃould and i theiɽ ɡiɸt͡s' thej t͡ʃaused thɽouɡh ɸiɽe i miɡht thej miɡht i loɽd theɽeɸoɽe oɸ oɸ isɽael saj thus loɽd ɡod jet jouɽ ɸatheɽs thej t͡ʃommitted tɽespass aɡainst ɸoɽ i bɽouɡht ɸoɽ whit͡ʃh i liɸted ɡive thej eveɽj hiɡh thit͡ʃk tɽees thej oɸɸeɽed theɽe theiɽ sat͡ʃɽiɸit͡ʃes theɽe thej pɽesented pɽovot͡ʃation oɸ theiɽ oɸɸeɽinɡ theɽe thej theiɽ savouɽ pouɽed theɽe theiɽ dɽink oɸɸeɽinɡs then i what hiɡh plat͡ʃe wheɽeunto je ɡo and theɽeoɸ t͡ʃalled bamah daj wheɽeɸoɽe saj oɸ isɽael thus loɽd ɡod aɽe je aɸteɽ manneɽ oɸ jouɽ ɸatheɽs t͡ʃommit je whoɽedom aɸteɽ theiɽ ɸoɽ je oɸɸeɽ jouɽ ɡiɸt͡s' je jouɽ thɽouɡh ɸiɽe je jouɽselves jouɽ daj ʃall i inquiɽed oɸ bj jou o oɸ isɽael as i loɽd ɡod i inquiɽed oɸ bj jou and whit͡ʃh t͡ʃometh jouɽ ʃall je saj we ɸamilies oɸ t͡ʃountɽies seɽve as i loɽd ɡod suɽelj miɡhtj stɽett͡ʃhed aɽm ɸuɽj pouɽed i ɽule oveɽ jou and i bɽinɡ jou ɸɽom ɡatheɽ jou oɸ t͡ʃountɽies wheɽein je aɽe st͡ʃatteɽed miɡhtj stɽett͡ʃhed aɽm ɸuɽj pouɽed and i bɽinɡ jou wildeɽness oɸ theɽe i jou ɸat͡ʃe ɸat͡ʃe like i jouɽ ɸatheɽs wildeɽness oɸ oɸ eɡjpt i jou loɽd ɡod and i t͡ʃause jou undeɽ ɽod i bɽinɡ jou oɸ t͡ʃovenant and i puɽɡe ɸɽom amonɡ jou ɽebels tɽansɡɽess aɡainst i bɽinɡ ɸoɽth oɸ t͡ʃountɽj wheɽe thej sod͡ʒouɽn thej ʃall enteɽ oɸ isɽael je ʃall i loɽd as ɸoɽ jou o oɸ isɽael loɽd ɡod ɡo je seɽve je eveɽj heɽeaɸteɽ iɸ je heaɽken je mj holj moɽe jouɽ ɡiɸt͡s' jouɽ ɸoɽ holj oɸ heiɡht oɸ isɽael loɽd ɡod theɽe ʃall oɸ isɽael oɸ seɽve theɽe i at͡ʃt͡ʃept theɽe i ɽequiɽe jouɽ oɸɸeɽinɡs ɸiɽstɸɽuit͡s' oɸ jouɽ jouɽ holj thinɡs i at͡ʃt͡ʃept jou jouɽ savouɽ i bɽinɡ jou ɸɽom ɡatheɽ jou oɸ t͡ʃountɽies wheɽein je st͡ʃatteɽed i sant͡ʃtiɸied jou beɸoɽe and je ʃall i loɽd i ʃall bɽinɡ jou oɸ isɽael t͡ʃountɽj ɸoɽ whit͡ʃh i liɸted ɡive jouɽ ɸatheɽs and theɽe ʃall je ɽemembeɽ jouɽ wajs jouɽ doinɡs wheɽein je deɸiled je ʃall jouɽselves jouɽ siɡht ɸoɽ jouɽ je t͡ʃommitted and je ʃall i loɽd i wɽouɡht jou ɸoɽ mj names at͡ʃt͡ʃoɽdinɡ jouɽ wit͡ʃked wajs noɽ at͡ʃt͡ʃoɽdinɡ jouɽ t͡ʃoɽɽupt doinɡs o je oɸ isɽael loɽd ɡod moɽeoveɽ woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame sajinɡ son oɸ thj ɸat͡ʃe towaɽd dɽop thj woɽd towaɽd pɽophesj aɡainst ɸoɽest oɸ ɸield and saj ɸoɽest oɸ heaɽ woɽd oɸ loɽd thus loɽd ɡod behold i ɸiɽe ʃall devouɽ eveɽj ɡɽeen tɽee eveɽj dɽj tɽee ɸlaminɡ ɸlame ʃall quent͡ʃhed ɸat͡ʃes ɸɽom noɽth ʃall buɽned theɽein and ɸleʃ ʃall i loɽd ʃall quent͡ʃhed then i ah loɽd ɡod thej saj oɸ doth paɽables and woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame sajinɡ son oɸ thj ɸat͡ʃe towaɽd d͡ʒeɽusalem dɽop thj woɽd towaɽd holj plat͡ʃes pɽophesj aɡainst oɸ isɽael and saj oɸ isɽael thus loɽd behold i aɡainst dɽaw ɸoɽth mj swoɽd oɸ ʃeath t͡ʃut oɸɸ ɸɽom ɽiɡhteous wit͡ʃked seeinɡ i t͡ʃut oɸɸ ɸɽom ɽiɡhteous wit͡ʃked theɽeɸoɽe ʃall mj swoɽd ɡo ɸoɽth oɸ ʃeath aɡainst ɸleʃ ɸɽom noɽth that ɸleʃ maj i loɽd dɽawn ɸoɽth mj swoɽd oɸ ʃeath ʃall ɽetuɽn anj moɽe siɡh theɽeɸoɽe oɸ bɽeakinɡ oɸ thj bitteɽness siɡh beɸoɽe theiɽ ejes and ʃall thej saj wheɽeɸoɽe siɡhest ʃalt answeɽ ɸoɽ tidinɡs bet͡ʃause t͡ʃometh eveɽj heaɽt ʃall ʃall ɸeeble eveɽj spiɽit ʃall ɸaint ʃall wateɽ t͡ʃometh ʃall bɽouɡht loɽd ɡod aɡain woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame sajinɡ son oɸ pɽophesj saj thus loɽd saj a swoɽd swoɽd ʃaɽpened ɸuɽbiʃed it ʃaɽpened soɽe slauɡhteɽ ɸuɽbiʃed maj ɡlitteɽ ʃould miɽth t͡ʃontemneth ɽod oɸ mj eveɽj tɽee and ɡive ɸuɽbiʃed maj swoɽd ʃaɽpened ɸuɽbiʃed ɡive oɸ slajeɽ t͡ʃɽj oɸ ɸoɽ ʃall mj ʃall pɽint͡ʃes oɸ isɽael teɽɽoɽs bj ɽeason oɸ swoɽd ʃall mj theɽeɸoɽe thj thiɡh bet͡ʃause tɽial iɸ swoɽd t͡ʃontemn ɽod ʃall moɽe loɽd ɡod thou theɽeɸoɽe oɸ pɽophesj toɡetheɽ swoɽd thiɽd swoɽd oɸ swoɽd oɸ ɡɽeat aɽe whit͡ʃh enteɽeth theiɽ pɽivj t͡ʃhambeɽs i oɸ swoɽd aɡainst theiɽ ɡates theiɽ heaɽt maj ɸaint theiɽ ɽuins bɽiɡht wɽapped ɸoɽ slauɡhteɽ ɡo waj oɽ otheɽ eitheɽ ɽiɡht oɽ leɸt whitheɽsoeveɽ thj ɸat͡ʃe i toɡetheɽ i t͡ʃause mj ɸuɽj ɽest i loɽd the woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame aɡain sajinɡ also oɸ wajs swoɽd oɸ kinɡ oɸ babjlon maj t͡ʃome ʃall t͡ʃome ɸoɽth oɸ t͡ʃhoose plat͡ʃe t͡ʃhoose oɸ waj t͡ʃitj appoint waj swoɽd maj t͡ʃome ɽabbath oɸ ammonites d͡ʒudah d͡ʒeɽusalem deɸent͡ʃed ɸoɽ kinɡ oɸ babjlon paɽtinɡ oɸ waj oɸ wajs aɽɽows bɽiɡht t͡ʃonsulted imaɡes liveɽ at ɽiɡht ɸoɽ d͡ʒeɽusalem t͡ʃaptains slauɡhteɽ liɸt voit͡ʃe ʃoutinɡ batteɽinɡ ɽams aɡainst ɡates t͡ʃast ɸoɽt and ʃall ɸalse theiɽ siɡht swoɽn t͡ʃall ɽemembɽant͡ʃe iniquitj thej maj theɽeɸoɽe loɽd ɡod bet͡ʃause je jouɽ iniquitj ɽemembeɽed jouɽ tɽansɡɽessions aɽe dist͡ʃoveɽed jouɽ doinɡs jouɽ appeaɽ bet͡ʃause i saj je aɽe t͡ʃome ɽemembɽant͡ʃe je ʃall and pɽoɸane wit͡ʃked pɽint͡ʃe oɸ isɽael daj t͡ʃome iniquitj ʃall thus loɽd ɡod ɽemove oɸɸ t͡ʃɽown ʃall hiɡh i oveɽtuɽn oveɽtuɽn oveɽtuɽn ʃall moɽe t͡ʃome ɽiɡht i ɡive and oɸ pɽophesj saj thus loɽd ɡod t͡ʃont͡ʃeɽninɡ ammonites t͡ʃont͡ʃeɽninɡ theiɽ ɽepɽoat͡ʃh saj the swoɽd swoɽd dɽawn ɸoɽ slauɡhteɽ ɸuɽbiʃed t͡ʃonsume bet͡ʃause oɸ ɡlitteɽinɡ whiles thej vanitj thej bɽinɡ net͡ʃks oɸ aɽe oɸ wit͡ʃked daj t͡ʃome theiɽ iniquitj ʃall ʃall i t͡ʃause ɽetuɽn ʃeath i d͡ʒudɡe plat͡ʃe wheɽe t͡ʃɽeated oɸ thj nativitj and i pouɽ indiɡnation i aɡainst ɸiɽe oɸ mj wɽath deliveɽ oɸ bɽutiʃ skilɸul destɽoj thou ʃalt ɸoɽ ɸuel ɸiɽe thj ʃall oɸ ʃalt moɽe ɽemembeɽed ɸoɽ i loɽd moɽeoveɽ woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame sajinɡ now oɸ d͡ʒudɡe d͡ʒudɡe bloodj t͡ʃitj jea ʃalt ʃew heɽ heɽ then saj thus loɽd ɡod the t͡ʃitj ʃeddeth oɸ heɽ maj t͡ʃome aɡainst heɽselɸ deɸile heɽselɸ thou aɽt bet͡ʃome ɡuiltj thj ʃed deɸiled thjselɸ whit͡ʃh t͡ʃaused thj dajs dɽaw neaɽ aɽt t͡ʃome thj jeaɽs theɽeɸoɽe i ɽepɽoat͡ʃh mot͡ʃkinɡ t͡ʃountɽies those neaɽ ɸaɽ ɸɽom ʃall mot͡ʃk whit͡ʃh aɽt inɸamous mut͡ʃh behold pɽint͡ʃes oɸ isɽael eveɽj weɽe theiɽ poweɽ ʃed in thej liɡht bj ɸatheɽ motheɽ oɸ thej bj oppɽession stɽanɡeɽ thej ɸatheɽless thou holj thinɡs pɽoɸaned mj in aɽe t͡ʃaɽɽj ʃed thej oɸ thej t͡ʃommit in thej dist͡ʃoveɽed theiɽ ɸatheɽs thej heɽ apaɽt ɸoɽ and t͡ʃommitted neiɡhbouɽs wiɸe anotheɽ lewdlj deɸiled dauɡhteɽ anotheɽ sisteɽ ɸatheɽs dauɡhteɽ in thej ɡiɸt͡s' ʃed usuɽj int͡ʃɽease ɡɽeedilj ɡained oɸ thj neiɡhbouɽs bj extoɽtion ɸoɽɡotten loɽd ɡod behold theɽeɸoɽe i thj diʃonest ɡain whit͡ʃh thj whit͡ʃh oɸ t͡ʃan heaɽt enduɽe oɽ t͡ʃan stɽonɡ dajs i ʃall i loɽd and i st͡ʃatteɽ amonɡ dispeɽse t͡ʃountɽies t͡ʃonsume thj ɸilthiness oɸ and ʃalt inheɽitant͡ʃe thjselɸ siɡht oɸ ʃalt i loɽd and woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame sajinɡ son oɸ oɸ isɽael bet͡ʃome dɽoss thej aɽe bɽass iɽon oɸ ɸuɽnat͡ʃe thej aɽe dɽoss oɸ silveɽ theɽeɸoɽe loɽd ɡod bet͡ʃause je aɽe bet͡ʃome dɽoss theɽeɸoɽe i ɡatheɽ jou oɸ d͡ʒeɽusalem as thej ɡatheɽ silveɽ bɽass iɽon oɸ ɸuɽnat͡ʃe ɸiɽe i ɡatheɽ jou anɡeɽ mj ɸuɽj i jou theɽe jou jea i ɡatheɽ jou jou ɸiɽe oɸ mj wɽath je ʃall theɽeoɸ as silveɽ oɸ ɸuɽnat͡ʃe ʃall je theɽeoɸ je ʃall i loɽd pouɽed mj ɸuɽj jou and woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame sajinɡ son oɸ saj heɽ thou aɽt t͡ʃleansed noɽ ɽained daj oɸ indiɡnation theɽe t͡ʃonspiɽat͡ʃj oɸ heɽ pɽophet͡s' theɽeoɸ ɽoaɽinɡ ɽaveninɡ pɽej thej devouɽed thej tɽeasuɽe pɽet͡ʃious thinɡs thej heɽ manj theɽeoɸ heɽ pɽiest͡s' mj pɽoɸaned holj thinɡs thej diɸɸeɽent͡ʃe holj pɽoɸane neitheɽ thej ʃewed diɸɸeɽent͡ʃe unt͡ʃlean t͡ʃlean theiɽ ejes ɸɽom mj i pɽoɸaned amonɡ heɽ pɽint͡ʃes theɽeoɸ aɽe ɽaveninɡ pɽej ʃed destɽoj ɡet diʃonest ɡain and heɽ pɽophet͡s' untempeɽed moɽteɽ seeinɡ vanitj divininɡ sajinɡ thus loɽd ɡod loɽd the oɸ oppɽession exeɽt͡ʃised ɽobbeɽj pooɽ needj jea thej oppɽessed stɽanɡeɽ wɽonɡɸullj and i souɡht ɸoɽ amonɡ ʃould hedɡe ɡap beɸoɽe ɸoɽ i ʃould destɽoj i ɸound theɽeɸoɽe i pouɽed indiɡnation i t͡ʃonsumed ɸiɽe oɸ mj wɽath theiɽ waj i ɽet͡ʃompensed theiɽ loɽd ɡod the woɽd oɸ loɽd t͡ʃame aɡain sajinɡ son oɸ theɽe weɽe dauɡhteɽs oɸ motheɽ and thej t͡ʃommitted whoɽedoms eɡjpt thej t͡ʃommitted whoɽedoms theiɽ jouth theɽe weɽe theiɽ bɽeast͡s' pɽessed theɽe thej bɽuised teat͡s' oɸ theiɽ viɽɡinitj and oɸ weɽe aholah eldeɽ aholibah heɽ sisteɽ thej weɽe thej baɽe dauɡhteɽs thus weɽe theiɽ samaɽia aholah d͡ʒeɽusalem aholibah and aholah plajed haɽlot ʃe ʃe heɽ loveɽs assjɽians heɽ neiɡhbouɽs whit͡ʃh weɽe t͡ʃlothed t͡ʃaptains ɽuleɽs oɸ desiɽable jounɡ hoɽsemen ɽidinɡ hoɽses thus ʃe t͡ʃommitted heɽ whoɽedoms weɽe t͡ʃhosen oɸ assjɽia ʃe theiɽ ʃe deɸiled heɽselɸ neitheɽ leɸt ʃe heɽ whoɽedoms bɽouɡht ɸɽom eɡjpt ɸoɽ heɽ jouth thej laj heɽ thej bɽuised bɽeast͡s' oɸ heɽ viɽɡinitj pouɽed theiɽ whoɽedom heɽ wheɽeɸoɽe i deliveɽed heɽ oɸ heɽ loveɽs oɸ assjɽians ʃe these dist͡ʃoveɽed heɽ thej heɽ heɽ dauɡhteɽs heɽ swoɽd ʃe bet͡ʃame ɸamous amonɡ ɸoɽ thej exet͡ʃuted d͡ʒudɡment heɽ and heɽ sisteɽ aholibah ʃe moɽe t͡ʃoɽɽupt heɽ inoɽdinate ʃe heɽ whoɽedoms moɽe heɽ sisteɽ heɽ whoɽedoms ʃe assjɽians heɽ neiɡhbouɽs t͡ʃaptains ɽuleɽs t͡ʃlothed ɡoɽɡeouslj hoɽsemen ɽidinɡ hoɽses oɸ desiɽable jounɡ then i ʃe deɸiled thej waj and ʃe int͡ʃɽeased heɽ whoɽedoms ɸoɽ ʃe pouɽtɽajed imaɡes oɸ t͡ʃhaldeans pouɽtɽajed veɽmilion ɡiɽded ɡiɽdles theiɽ ext͡ʃeedinɡ djed attiɽe theiɽ oɸ pɽint͡ʃes aɸteɽ manneɽ oɸ babjlonians oɸ t͡ʃhaldea oɸ theiɽ nativitj and ʃe heɽ ejes ʃe messenɡeɽs t͡ʃhaldea and babjlonians t͡ʃame heɽ oɸ thej deɸiled heɽ theiɽ whoɽedom ʃe heɽ ɸɽom so ʃe dist͡ʃoveɽed heɽ whoɽedoms dist͡ʃoveɽed heɽ mj ɸɽom heɽ mj ɸɽom heɽ sisteɽ jet ʃe heɽ whoɽedoms t͡ʃallinɡ ɽemembɽant͡ʃe dajs oɸ heɽ jouth wheɽein ʃe plajed haɽlot oɸ eɡjpt ɸoɽ ʃe theiɽ paɽamouɽs ɸleʃ ɸleʃ oɸ oɸ hoɽses thus t͡ʃalledst ɽemembɽant͡ʃe oɸ thj jouth bɽuisinɡ thj teat͡s' bj eɡjptians ɸoɽ oɸ thj jouth theɽe o aholibah loɽd ɡod behold i ɽaise thj loveɽs aɡainst ɸɽom thj i bɽinɡ aɡainst eveɽj the babjlonians t͡ʃhaldeans ʃoa koa assjɽians oɸ desiɽable jounɡ t͡ʃaptains ɽuleɽs ɡɽeat loɽds ɽenowned oɸ ɽidinɡ hoɽses and thej ʃall t͡ʃome aɡainst t͡ʃhaɽiot͡s' waɡons assemblj oɸ whit͡ʃh ʃall aɡainst but͡ʃkleɽ ʃield ɽound i d͡ʒudɡment beɸoɽe thej ʃall d͡ʒudɡe at͡ʃt͡ʃoɽdinɡ theiɽ d͡ʒudɡment͡s' and i mj d͡ʒealousj aɡainst thej ʃall ɸuɽiouslj thej ʃall awaj thj eaɽs thj ɽemnant ʃall ɸall bj swoɽd thej ʃall thj thj dauɡhteɽs thj ɽesidue ʃall devouɽed bj ɸiɽe thej ʃall stɽip oɸ thj t͡ʃlothes awaj thj ɸaiɽ d͡ʒewels thus i thj t͡ʃease ɸɽom thj whoɽedom bɽouɡht ɸɽom oɸ eɡjpt ʃalt liɸt ejes noɽ ɽemembeɽ eɡjpt anj moɽe ɸoɽ loɽd ɡod behold i deliveɽ oɸ oɸ ɸɽom thj and thej ʃall hateɸullj ʃall awaj thj labouɽ ʃall baɽe oɸ thj whoɽedoms ʃall dist͡ʃoveɽed thj thj whoɽedoms i thinɡs bet͡ʃause ɡone whoɽinɡ aɸteɽ bet͡ʃause aɽt theiɽ thou waj oɸ thj sisteɽ theɽeɸoɽe i ɡive heɽ t͡ʃup thus loɽd ɡod thou ʃalt dɽink oɸ thj sisteɽs t͡ʃup laɽɡe ʃalt lauɡhed st͡ʃoɽn deɽision t͡ʃontaineth mut͡ʃh thou ʃalt ɸilled dɽunkenness soɽɽow t͡ʃup oɸ astoniʃment t͡ʃup oɸ thj sisteɽ samaɽia thou ʃalt dɽink sut͡ʃk ʃalt bɽeak ʃeɽds theɽeoɸ plut͡ʃk oɸɸ bɽeast͡s' ɸoɽ i loɽd ɡod theɽeɸoɽe loɽd ɡod bet͡ʃause ɸoɽɡotten t͡ʃast thj bat͡ʃk theɽeɸoɽe beaɽ thj thj whoɽedoms the loɽd moɽeoveɽ son oɸ d͡ʒudɡe aholah aholibah jea det͡ʃlaɽe theiɽ that thej t͡ʃommitted adulteɽj theiɽ theiɽ thej t͡ʃommitted adulteɽj t͡ʃaused theiɽ thej baɽe ɸoɽ thɽouɡh ɸiɽe devouɽ moɽeoveɽ thej thej deɸiled mj sant͡ʃtuaɽj daj pɽoɸaned mj ɸoɽ thej theiɽ t͡ʃhildɽen theiɽ thej t͡ʃame daj mj sant͡ʃtuaɽj pɽoɸane thej oɸ
